name: Patagonia Skyline Traveller Pants - Women's
description:
Scale peaks, chill by the lake or explore cobblestone lanes. Wherever you wander, these stretchy pants will carry you through. The durable woven blend of nylon and spandex has a durable water repelllent finish to shed rain and spills, wick sweat and improve drying time.Button-closure waistband has an internal adjustment to customize the fit.2 front pockets, 2 back pockets and a thigh pocket hold small essentials.Slim-cut legs have a zippered gusset.

        Sustainability
